title: (Mon Early Bird)  Eddie's Bad Influence on His Kids + Amy's Son Football Update + Mailbag: Wife Annoyed With Husband During Football Season
itunes:title: (Mon Early Bird)  Eddie's Bad Influence on His Kids + Amy's Son Football Update + Mailbag: Wife Annoyed With Husband During Football Season
description:
Eddie did something in front of his kids that could be considered a bad influence... we discuss if we think it is or not. Plus, Amy gives us an update on how her son's football season is going! We open the mailbag and give advice to a wife who says once Football starts it eliminates any chance of a social life on the weekends for her husband. She needs advice on how to get him to do more than just watch football.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
